task: Develop a basic 'Mancala' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Decorate, decorate'.
name: Mancala: Jewel Gardens

branding_data.short_description: Experience the classic game of Mancala reimagined with a vibrant, jewel-themed twist.
branding_data.detailed_description: Mancala: Jewel Gardens takes the ancient and strategic board game of Mancala and transforms it into a visually stunning experience. The traditional pits and stones are now lush gardens filled with sparkling jewels and precious stones. Each move not only requires strategic thinking but also delights the senses with intricate decorations and vibrant colors. As you move your jewels across the board, watch as the garden blooms and evolves, adding a new layer of aesthetic pleasure to the timeless game. This version of Mancala invites players to engage both strategically and artistically, creating a unique and immersive gameplay experience.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
